br.eti.villani.util

Class XmlIrmaCodeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.eti.villani.util.XmlIrmaCodeBuilder

  • public class XmlIrmaCodeBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class builds the xml file based in the content of the txt file provided by Image Retrieval in Medical Applications (IRMA). The txt file contains the IRMA code structure used in various medical applications. To download the current version of txt file, access IRMA Code download. That xml file is need in multi-label application that uses the mulan framework.
    Author:
    VILLANI, L. and PRATI, R. C.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlIrmaCodeBuilder

        public XmlIrmaCodeBuilder(java.lang.String fileName,
                  java.lang.String xmlName)
                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Builds the xml file based in content of the txt source file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the source file that has the IRMA code structure. That file must be within project directory that uses the XmlIrmaCodeBuilder.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If source file not found.
        java.io.IOException - If the xml file cannot be manipulated.
